name: 3-D Maze (Phoenix Publishing Associates)
overview: Published in "The Commodore 64 Program Book." You are trapped at the southern end of a tortuous maze and must try to reach the exit, which you know lies somewhere to the north. You will see a perspective view of the inside of the maze, as you wander around it, with either open or blocked doors in front of you and to your left and right. To face in a particular direction press keys N, S, E or W. To move forward press the F key. 86 difficulty levels to choose from.
